snippet: Daniel Aukin, who’s directing the premiere of Sam Shepard’s “Heartless” for Signature Theater, is admired for embracing uncertainty, his colleagues say.
abstract: Stage director Daniel Aukin, whose production of Sam Shepard's Heartless is now in previews at Signature Center, encourages everyone he works with to do things badly at first and learn from their mistakes as a way to develop the texture and truthfulness he strives for.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Aukin, who’s directing the premiere of Sam Shepard’s “Heartless” for Signature Theater, is admired for embracing uncertainty, his colleagues say.
